Quickstride and Nightshift get Legacy's call and begin to saunter up to the=
 secondary docking bay.  Nighrshift hops up onto his buddies back and bums =
a ride off him.

" Hope ya don't mind Nightshift, but I'm beat."

Quickstri=
de nods.

" Nope not at all.  Hmmm my stomach isn't gassy anymore.  Must be=
 the upgrade.  I wonder what Legacy wants us for..  Anyway we'll find out s=
hortly.

He trots into Legacy's location as Nightshift sits on his back.

"=
 Wassup Legacy, need us ta run an errand for ya?"

Local artist who special=
izes in illustration, using traditional and digital media.  

I also specia=
lize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!  

Need a great gift ide=
a that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this address and we will talk=
.  

On Jun 18, 2012, at 2:23 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> =
wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson remains right beside Talon and settles in =
for a rest himself,
> > returning to beast mode, and curling up in a ball a=
t her bedside. His eyes
> > close, heavy with exhaustion. It's not long bef=
ore he too is sleeping
> > soundly. Yet his vigil is clear as his long tail=
 coils around the bed. But
> > now it was time for rest. And rest he was ge=
tting.
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> And so that ARK settled down into a comforting routi=
ne. Lights in
> unused rooms began to shut down, including the medical bay =
and things
> begin to go quiet.
> 
> NIGHTSHIFT and QUICKSTRIDE receive mes=
sages from LEGACY, "Report to
> the secondary docking bay."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
>=
 - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-DEDB876A-5388-4E63-9C16-7B6111D7324F
